item.title: Statistics of triggers Tag on Stackoverflow
item.description: Gists This is the statistics for the tag triggers on Stackoverflow. The tag of triggers was created at 2011-07-28. This statistics are retrieve from Stackoverflow using Stackexchange API. About 2020, the data is retrieved from 2020-01-01 to 2020-07-16. This statistics data was obtained at 2020-07-16. Measurement result Fig. 1: About triggers tag. Year vs. Total questions, Answered, Solved and Closed questions Fig. 2: About google-apps-script tag and triggers tag. Year vs.
